com.ethercis.servicemanager.runlevel

Class ServiceConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ethercis.servicemanager.runlevel.ServiceConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_AttributeUser, I_AdminUsage, ServiceConfigMBean

    public class ServiceConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceConfigMBean, I_AttributeUser
    This class contains the information on how to configure a certain service and when a certain service is invoked by the run level manager

    <service id='storage:CACHE' className='com.privantis.cache.PersistenceCacheService'> <attribute id='transientQueue'>storage:RAM</attribute> <attribute id='persistentQueue'>storage:JDBC</attribute> </service>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DEFAULT_CREATE 
      TimeStamp uniqueTimestamp
      timestamp used to get uniquity (since runlevel + sequeuence is not unique)

      • unwrapAttributeFromCDATA

        public void unwrapAttributeFromCDATA(java.lang.String attributeKey)
        When the attribute is written to a string in the toXml methods it is wrapped inside a CDATA. This can be undone if you pass 'true' here.
        Specified by:
        unwrapAttributeFromCDATA in interface I_AttributeUser
